headline: Post-Powell speech rally: Ethereum & Opendoor among top winners
summary: US stocks (^DJI, ^GSPC, ^IXIC) ended Friday's session higher, with bitcoin (BTC-USD) and ethereum (ETH-USD) also seeing significant gains. Crypto-related stocks, like Robinhood (HOOD), Coinbase (COIN), and Strategy (MSTR), and high volatility names like Opendoor (OPEN) saw price jumps. Yahoo Finance Senior Reporter Allie Canal outlines what investors need to know about the market rally following Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell's Jackson Hole remarks. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Domination.

headline: Coinbase (COIN) Stock Trades Up, Here Is Why
summary: Shares of blockchain infrastructure company Coinbase (NASDAQ:COIN) jumped 7% in the afternoon session after Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell hinted at a potential interest rate cut, which boosted investor appetite for riskier assets like cryptocurrencies. The positive turn in sentiment came after Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell's speech in Jackson Hole, where he hinted at the possibility of an interest rate cut as soon as next month.

headline: Dow Hits Record Highs, Small Caps Soar On Powell's Shift: What's Moving Markets Friday?
summary: A strong rally erupted on Friday on Wall Street shortly after Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell delivered a notably dovish message during his highly anticipated speech at Jackson Hole. IWM ETF is moving fast. Check live prices here. Powell said the Fed is prepared to adjust its policy stance—a clear nod to potential interest rate cuts—in response to the sharp cooling in the labor market. He also adopted a more tolerant tone on inflation risks stemming from trade tariffs, saying the Fed's base
